text: ARrf4 <7cfl4 <oTHT wifedsrut Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 Fax 91-11-25093507/25093514 (434 4a6t 3r 7onumff #TT) Extn. 2223/2318/2468/2553 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport & Highways) G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No. 11041/21/2002-Admn: September 29, 2004 30 POLICY MATTER_ ADMINISTRATIONIFINANCE (8912004) (Decision taken on File No. NHA11 1033/Duty ExompVDGMF) dated 08.09.2004) Sub: Issue %f Certificates to the Contractors for Availment of Customs Central Excise Duty Exemption This is with further reference Circular: ADMINISTRATIONIFINANCE (05/2002) issued on the subject  It has been brought to our notice that the term "World Bank" which is used in the certificates issued for World Bank aided projects may not be considered correct as the said term "World Bank" covers two institutions viz , IBRD and IDA For duty exemption under Excise provisions, IDA funded projects may not qualify. Hence , to lend clarity in the matter, for all such certificates issued in future, for World Bank aided funded projects, the name of the lending institution should be mentioned as "IBRD( WORLD BANK)" instead of the term "WORLD BANK" This issues with the approval of the Competent Authority: (V.K Sharak) | General Manager (Admn:) To: 1.
